messages.description: Array of all messages posted to this board.

id.description: Unique message identifier (must be at least 1).

author.description: Username of the character who posted the message.

subject.description: Subject line or title of the message.

content.description: Main body text of the message.

postedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the message was posted.

targets.description: Optional list of usernames this message is specifically targeted to.

readBy.description: List of character IDs who have read this message.
